text_block_list.text: The day after. Unable to shake my doubts, I wandered to the track. A mock race was being held, and things looked surprisingly lively.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Wow, Mr. C.B. is really running! The last corner is coming up, which means―!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Yep, here we go……! Her piercing lunge from the back!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: ― Haaaaah!
(Waaaaaaaaaaah!)
The trackside excitement lingered after the racing horsegirls had left. Most animated among the spectating crowd was—

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… Amazing. Amazing! Amazing, amazing, amazing!! I wanna run now! I wanna ruuun!!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, why don't we all go run!? Come race with me!!

text_block_list.name: Roaring Runner Duo
text_block_list.text: WEEEIIII!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: How do you expect us not to be hyped after that race! So bring it, Ines!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Heck yeah! I'm in!

text_block_list.name: Spectating Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ueh, what the?! This a 2400m race, yeah?! How are they gonna run that at this pace…!?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: (200m left! I hear Palmer's and Helios' steps! 3m, 2m…… no, even closer ―)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: (My legs feel heavy, my lungs hurt… but who cares!)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: (Who cares about limits! When I can still feel the heat of the race earlier lingering over the turf? There's only fast, and faster! Faster, faster, fasteeer!)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Heheh…… ahah, ahaha……!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ― Haaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ……! Pheh, hah, phah…… phuh, phaa……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Yo, are you alright? Ines? You just don't have any brakes, do you, girl.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Haaaa — Ahaha, I'm alright, I'm alright. Nah, actually, I feel amazing.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ahah! Yea, I can tell from your face!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Heh… as ever, her usual sisterly energy just disappears when she's racing.
My pulse was racing too. I couldn't get the sight of her running — an animalistic figure with no restraint on the turf — out of my mind.
choice_data_list: (She's a whole different beast in a race.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: …… I can't let myself get beat either! Right, time to get changed and go train train train these muscles!
Unable to take my eyes off her, I watched her catch her breath for a while…… until she noticed and came over to me.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Oh, you're the phone person from the other day! I knew you were a trainer at Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: You've been gazing at me for a while, right? Can I help you?
choice_data_list: Oh, uhhh… I see you like racing.
Oh, uhhh… I see you like racing.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ahah, yeah! There's nothing I like more!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Running makes me all… bouncy and energetic! I just… can't stop myself from going forward!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: And when I'm out at the front, it's like my whole body tingles, I feel so good… it's just amazingly wonderful!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: That feeling…… You'd understand if you were a horsegirl, I'm sure.
choice_data_list: I think I get it just looking.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, I see. ……Oh, right! Since you were watching me all race―

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: What did you think? I'm sure I can still run faster! Could you give me some advice from a pro's point of view?
I thought back on the recent races I saw. There's no doubt that her innate speed and strong desire to run ahead are incredibly suited to an escape strategy.
But even so, there are many different approaches to that. Some try to control the race from an early advantage, others try to outrun by keeping an even pace all the way.
I told her I would need to gain a deeper understanding of her and the way she runs first, to think of fitting advice that would help her become stronger.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: You'd like to know me better…… I see.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Then…… why don't you become my temporary trainer!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Now, now, hear me out. I don't think it's a bad deal to you. … Actually, I'm gonna be running at the next Race Meet.
The Semiannual Race Meet is an in-academy event in which horsegirls choose the races they enter themselves, to allow them to probe their own skills and abilities.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: My family's coming to watch, so you know. I thought it'd be a good chance to show them "hey, I'm doing my best and growing at this academy".

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: But training on my own just isn't efficient enough. I've been thinking I'd really like to have a specialist to guide me. And for you —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: You don't have the confidence to be a "trainer"— the confidence to lead and be responsible for somebody yet, do you?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ah, weeell, I kinda overheard you? But anyway, it could be a good chance to develop your confidence training with me, right?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I mean, this is a win-win proposition! So, I'll see you tomorrow, alright?♪
And just like that, I entered an unexpected provisional agreement with Ines Fujin.
